description:
WinSetView provides an easy way to set Windows File Explorer default folder views.

WinSetView provides an easy way to set Windows File Explorer default folder views. For example, if you want Details view, with a particular selection of column headings enabled across all folders, then WinSetView will do that for you.
Bug Fix: Fixed label click for "Remove Home in Windows 11" and "Remove Gallery in Windows 11"See 3.1.1 release notes for significant changes in 3.1.x
